critique: The document is an executive order approving a code of fair competition for the wholesale fresh fruit and vegetable distributive industry. The tone is formal and legalistic. The primary emotion the President wants to elicit is a sense of confidence and stability in the market. There is a slight sense of joy that the code has been approved and will help the industry. There is no indication of sadness, anger, fear, or disgust. There might be a slight sense of surprise that the code has been approved so quickly.
